title: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When executing the ShiftLeft function, the text does not move as expected when there are tabs and spaces mixed in the indentation. It is unclear why the text won't shift and it can be confusing.
EB: Replace the tab character in the first line with spaces so that both lines are indented the same visually. After executing ShiftLeft, the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left at least to the space character, effectively removing the tab. This behavior needs clarification in the specifications.
SR:
1. Open the document with lines containing both tabs and spaces in the indentation.
2. Replace the tab character with spaces in the first line.
3. Execute the ShiftLeft function.
4. Observe that the text does not move correctly.
